name: packages-allowlist
description: CFEngine build module repository hosting a module to manage software based on an allowed list of packages.

packages-allowlist.description: This module reports on and optionally removes software installed by the platforms default package module (e.g. ~yum~,  ~apt_get~) that is not in an explicit allow list.

input.label: (disabled|enabled)
input.question: Would you like to enable enforcement for packages-allowlist?

input.label: Package name

subtype.label: Package name
subtype.question: What package name would you like to allow?

input.while: Do you want to allow another package?
